logo_header.label: Logo (header)
logo_header.comment: Upload logo image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

spy_panel.label: Following top panel
spy_panel.comment: Enable top fixed panel (WORKS ONLY WITH SIMPLE HEADER AND WITH ENABLED TOPMENU)

logo_quick_panel.label: Logo (Right quick panel)
logo_quick_panel.comment: Upload logo image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

ajax_add_to_cart.label: Ajax add to cart
ajax_add_to_cart.comment: Add to cart without render of the page

ajax_wish_comp.label: Ajax for add to wishlist/compare button
ajax_wish_comp.comment: Enable Ajax feature for wish list and compare buttons

ajax_toolbar.label: Ajax for toolbar/paging
ajax_toolbar.comment: Enable Ajax feature for sort / paging buttons

tag_cloud.label: Tag cloud
tag_cloud.comment: Switch between usual and flash animated tag block

responsive.label: Responsive html
responsive.comment: Enable/disable responsive mode for all gadget (iphone, ipad etc)

catalog_mode.label: Catalog mode
catalog_mode.comment: Create your shopping cart into simple catalog
catalog_mode.tooltip: This mode turns off add to cart buttons, account profile and cart functionality

css3_animation.label: Icon animation
css3_animation.comment:
ATTENTION! Refresh css files in
buyshop/theme configuration/colors, bg, fonts
to see changes

crossels.label: Show crossells products in shopping cart

brands.label: Brands for Amazing style
brands.comment: in module 'Shop by Brands' (separate labels by comma)

facebook_profile_name.label: Facebook profile name
facebook_profile_name.comment: Account ID for Facebook fan box

run.label: Run now
run.comment: ATTENTION! Be sure that folder skin/frontend/default/buyshop/css/colors has 777 permission. After click on 'Save Config' click 'Refresh css files'. After this you will be able to see changes on storefront.

theme_color.label: Theme Color
theme_color.comment: Set color for buttons, icons and backgrounds

theme_hover_color.label: Theme Hover Color
theme_hover_color.comment: Set color for mouse over for buttons, icons and backgrounds

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.comment: Set default text color for all blocks

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.comment: Set default link color for all blocks

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color
link_hover_color.comment: Set default link hover color for all blocks

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.comment: Set background color for all blocks

background_image.label: Background Image (All pages)
background_image.comment: Upload background image/pattern for all blocks (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

font.label: Font
font.comment: Select font which will be used for headings, buttons, block titles etc. Theme use Google font's library. Find out more here - Google web fonts free library

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.comment: Set link color for drop down box in header tool line

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color
link_hover_color.comment: Set link hover color for drop down box in header tool line

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.comment: Set background color for drop down box in header tool line

border_color.label: Border Color
border_color.comment: Set border color for drop down box in header tool line

arrow_image.label: Arrow Image
arrow_image.comment: Upload arrow image for dropdown boxes (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

header_tool_line.label: Header tool line (top and bottom line)

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.comment: Set text color for header tool line

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.comment: Set link color for header tool line

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color
link_hover_color.comment: Set link hover color for header tool line

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.comment: Set background color for header tool line

shadow.label: Shadow
shadow.comment: Set bottom shadow for header tool line

phone_color.label: Phone Color
phone_color.comment: Set phone color for header tool line

link_color_level_0.label: Link Color (level_0)
link_color_level_0.comment: Set link color for first level of top menu

background_image.label: Background Image
background_image.comment: For example: snow pattern for Christams

image_form_search.label: Search decoration in header
image_form_search.comment: For example: search decoration for Christams

decoration_fix.label: Search decoration position
decoration_fix.comment: Negative value in px to align search decoration

central_image.label: Central image in header
central_image.comment: For example: Santa Claus for Christams (only png)

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.comment: Set link color for drop down box (navigation menu, cart) in header

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color
link_hover_color.comment: Set link hover color for drop down box (navigation menu, cart) in header

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.comment: Set background color for drop down box (navigation menu, cart) in header

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.comment: Set text color for content blocks

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.comment: Set link color for content blocks

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color
link_hover_color.comment: Set link hover color for content blocks

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.comment: Set background color for content blocks

background_image.label: Background Image
background_image.comment: Upload background image/pattern for content blocks (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.comment: Set text color for footer info block

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.comment: Set link color for footer info block

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color
link_hover_color.comment: Set link hover color for footer info block

captions_color.label: Captions Color
captions_color.comment: Set captions color for footer info block

bold_color.label: Bold Text Color
bold_color.comment: Set bold text color for footer info block

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.comment: Set background color for footer info block

background_image.label: Background Image
background_image.comment: Upload background image/pattern for footer info block (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.comment: Set text color for footer block

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.comment: Set link color for footer block

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color
link_hover_color.comment: Set link hover color for footer block

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.comment: Set background color for footer block

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.comment: Set text color for footer popup block

caption_text_color.label: Caption Text Color
caption_text_color.comment: Set caption text color for footer popup block

link_color.label: Link Color
link_color.comment: Set link color for footer popup block

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color
link_hover_color.comment: Set link hover color for footer popup block

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.comment: Set background color for footer popup block

background_transparency.label: Background Transparency
background_transparency.comment: Set background transparency for footer popup block (0..1)

delimetr_content_image.label: Delimiter Content Image
delimetr_content_image.comment: Upload delimiter content image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

delimetr_footer_image.label: Delimiter Footer Image
delimetr_footer_image.comment: Upload delimiter footer image (JPG, PNG or GIF image)

product_border_color.label: Product border color (listing)
product_border_color.comment: Set product border color in listing

product_border_shadow.label: Product border shadow (listing)
product_border_shadow.comment: Enable product border shadow in listing

font.label: Font
font.comment: Select font which will be used for headings, buttons, block titles etc. Theme use Google font's library. Find out more here - Google web fonts free library

header_tool_line.label: Header tool line
header_tool_line.comment: Choose header tool line block layout or disable it. You can edit blocks content via CMS static block. To edit content go to CMS -> Static blocks. Choose needed block and edit it.

footer_info.label: Footer info
footer_info.comment: Enable footer info block. You can edit block content via CMS static block. To edit content go to CMS -> Static blocks. Choose needed block and edit it.

footer_transparent_popup.label: Footer popup
footer_transparent_popup.comment: Enable footer transparent popup block. You can edit block content via CMS static block. To edit content go to CMS -> Static blocks. Choose needed block and edit it.

footer_transparent_popup_static.label: Show Footer popup content
footer_transparent_popup_static.comment: Enable footer Footer popup content as static block. You can edit block content via CMS static block. To edit content go to CMS -> Static blocks. Choose needed block and edit it.

custom_block.label: Custom block
custom_block.comment: Enable custom block in main menu. You can edit block content via CMS static block. To edit content go to CMS -> Static blocks. Choose needed block and edit it.

custom_menu_url.label: Custom menu item - url
custom_menu_url.comment: Set url for custom menu item (use full url format starting with http://)

second_link.label: Second custom link in top menu
second_link.comment: Enable second custom link in top menu main menu.

second_link_title.label: Second custom link in top menu - title

second_link_url.label: Second custom link in top menu - url
second_link_url.comment: Set url for second custom link in top menu (use full url format starting with http://)

amazing_menu_description.label: "Shop by category" description
amazing_menu_description.comment: Enable custom block in amazing main menu. You can edit block content via CMS static block. To edit content go to CMS -> Static blocks. Choose needed block and edit it.

amazing_shop_by_brand.label: "Shop by Brand" description
amazing_shop_by_brand.comment: Enable Shop by Brand description. You can edit block content via CMS static block. To edit content go to CMS -> Static blocks. Choose needed block and edit it.

slider.label: Slider
slider.comment:
Choose slider type.
Flex is simple, fully responsive slider.
Parallax is layered slider. You can create slides with unlimited layres.
Staic image is good for corporate style
To edit slides and slider options go to eTheme - BuyShop -> Slider Configuration. Detailed description of configuration options you can find below in this doc.

revolution_slider_init.label: Init Revolution Slider
revolution_slider_init.comment: ATTENTION! If you want use revolution slider set Enable to init js

parallax_slider_init.label: Init Parallax Slider
parallax_slider_init.comment: ATTENTION! If you want use parallax slider set Enable to init js

product_listing_image_size.label: Product listing image size
product_listing_image_size.comment: Choose product image preview size in listing

show_category_description.label: Show category description
show_category_description.comment: Enable/disable custom category description before product listing. You can use custom HTML (description text, image banner or slider). To edit content go to Catalog -> Manage Categories -> choose category. On tab "General" fill field "Description"

sidebar.label: Sidebar
sidebar.comment: Enable/disable sidebar in product listing mode.

product_info_image_size.label: Product info image size
product_info_image_size.comment: Choose product preview image size on product info page.

product_custom_block.label: Product custom block
product_custom_block.comment: Choose product custom block type or disable it. You can edit option a (custom HTML) content via CMS static block. To edit content go to CMS -> Static blocks. Choose needed block and edit it.

prev_next_buttons.label: Prev / Next buttons
prev_next_buttons.comment: Enable/disable previous, next buttons on product info page.

prev_next_image_preview.label: Prev / Next image preview
prev_next_image_preview.comment:
Enable/disable image preview for previous, next buttons on product info page.
ATTENTION! prev/next buttons will disabled if enabled Flat catalogue mode
